body_html:
We are going to be revising the community pages in 2018. Until then, we don't really have a spot for repos like this outside of community/welcome.md, which will likely be changed as part of the revamp and is not altogether very visible right now.

A way to boost visibility for this solution is to ask and answer a Stack Overflow question about it, which has good search ranking.

I'm closing this, as I think @mrry answered the original question (we are unlikely to absorb this code into the main repo). The other issue, about finding a visible home for links to community repos, is on our roadmap already. Thanks!

body:
We are going to be revising the community pages in 2018.  Until then, we don't really have a spot for repos like this outside of community/welcome.md, which will likely be changed as part of the revamp and is not altogether very visible right now.

A way to boost visibility for this solution is to ask and answer a Stack Overflow question about it, which has good search ranking. 

I'm closing this, as I think @mrry answered the original question (we are unlikely to absorb this code into the main repo).  The other issue, about finding a visible home for links to community repos, is on our roadmap already.  Thanks!
